name: LanguageTag.Parser

unions.name: ParseResult
unions.comment:
A BCP 47 tag can be either

  - a "normal" tag, with language and optional sections for script, region, variants, extensions and private use
  - a "private use" tag, anything beginning with `x-`
  - a "grandfathered" tag, tags used before the standard was created.
cases: { language : String.String, script : Maybe.Maybe String.String, region : Maybe.Maybe String.String, variants : List.List String.String, extensions : List.List String.String, privateUse : List.List String.String }

values.name: toLanguageTag
values.comment: Convert the result of parsing into a `LanguageTag`.
